input: observation 1: Ben was taking piano lessons. [SEP] observation 2: So, Ben decided to quit taking piano lessons. [SEP] hypothesis 1: Ben's dog sat and listened to Ben play quietly. [SEP] hypothesis 2: Ben's dog howled every time he practiced.
